hero.title: صِلّ
hero.description: Transforming neighborhoods through secure, modern communication

concept.title: The Idea
concept.subtitle: Why صِلّ?
concept.description: In today's fast-paced world, neighbors have become strangers. صِلّ bridges this gap by creating a secure digital platform that reconnects residents within the same building or neighborhood.
concept.verifiedDesc: Unique codes from building owners ensure privacy and trust
concept.communityDesc: Modern platform for ancient values of neighborly compassion
concept.safeDesc: Control what personal data you share with your neighbors

features.title: Main Features
features.feature1Desc: Identify blocked cars and alert owners without sharing numbers
features.feature1Expanded: Allow users to safely notify car owners if their vehicle is blocking another, keeping phone numbers private. A smart alert system ensures communication happens securely through the app.
features.feature2Desc: Share neighborhood alerts and local announcements instantly
features.feature2Expanded: Post or receive important updates from your community in real-time. From maintenance notices to local events, stay connected and informed with your neighbors.
features.feature3Desc: Request help from neighbors or discover local trusted services
features.feature3Expanded: Whether you need to borrow a tool, ask for a favor, or find local recommendations (plumbers, electricians, etc.) — connect safely with neighbors and discover services reviewed by real residents.
features.feature4Desc: Choose what personal information to share
features.feature4Expanded: Manage who can see your contact info, apartment number, car details, or interact with you. Complete control over your personal data with customizable privacy settings.
features.feature5Desc: Browse available properties with real reviews
features.feature5Expanded: Explore nearby rentals and properties for sale with genuine reviews from current and former residents. Make informed decisions about where to live.
features.feature6Desc: Control messages and access from visitors
features.feature6Expanded: Let residents approve or block visitor communication securely. Manage who can contact you through the platform with full control and transparency.

community.title: Islamic Values. Modern Platform.
community.subtitle: صِلّ is inspired by our Islamic values
community.vision: صِلّ is not just a communication app—it's a digital platform that rebuilds community bonds in a modern, secure way, inspired by our Islamic teachings and the Prophet's ﷺ recommendation to care for neighbors up to the seventh neighbor, establishing a culture of cooperation and compassion within our community.
community.coreValuesDesc: Built on Islamic teachings, صِلّ embodies values that bring communities together
community.creationDesc: Only owners can create communities with authorization codes
community.invitationDesc: Send event invitations with time, place, and details
community.notificationsDesc: Important updates from owner at the top of community page
community.counterDesc: Support different community types - neighborhood and building communities
